data.quote: The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: t is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
data.author: J.K. Rowling

data.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
data.author: Marilyn Monroe

data.quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
data.author: Andr√© Gide

data.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
data.author: Thomas A. Edison

data.quote: Life is what happens to us while we are making other plans.
data.author: Allen Saunders

data.quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: Anyone who thinks sitting in church can make you a Christian must also think that sitting in a garage can make you a car.
data.author: Garrison Keillor

data.quote: Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all - in which case, you fail by default.
data.author: J.K. Rowling

data.quote: Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
data.author: Dr. Seuss

data.quote: The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for.
data.author: Bob Marley

data.quote: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.
data.author: Mother Teresa

data.quote: Any fool can know. The point is to understand.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
data.author: George Eliot

data.quote: You believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself.
data.author: Marilyn Monroe

data.quote: Only in the darkness can you see the stars.
data.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
